Transform the vertical line pattern to a horizontal line pattern
completions.code:
(do
    (rule
        (vars (this other))
        (filter (and (color_equals (color_of this) R) (color_equals (color_of other) O)))
        (apply (move_node right))
    )
)

completions.nl_description: Extend all objects of color R in all directions until they hit another object.
completions.code:
(do
    (rule
        (vars (this))
        (filter
            (color_equals (color_of this) R)
        )
        (apply
            (extend_node up false)
            (extend_node down false)
            (extend_node left false)
            (extend_node right false)
        )
    )
)

completions.code:
(do
    (rule
        (vars (this))
        (filter
            (and
                (size_equals (size_of this) 1)
                (color_equals (color_of this) R)
            )
        )
        (apply
            (extend_node up false)
            (extend_node down false)
            (extend_node left false)
            (extend_node right false)
        )
    )
)

completions.nl_description: Recolor columns containing object R to that color (R).
Move all objects of color R to the leftmost side of the grid.
Move all objects of color R toward the object of color X, if they are neighbors of it. Then move all objects of color R one step up.
Extend all objects colored R upwards to fill the entire column, without overlapping.
Recolor the vertical center column objects to 'R' and extend them upwards and downwards.
completions.code:
(do
    (rule
        (vars (this))
        (filter (column_equals (column_of this) 2))
        (apply
            (update_color R)
            (extend_node up false)
            (extend_node down false)
        )
    )
)
